ProductInfo.Features:
A touch screen with intuitive buttons allows your customers to interact directly with the VX 680 without ever handing over their credit cards. The color screen can also display graphics, logos or promotional messages for added customer engagement
The VX 680 is a small, full-function, portable, handheld payment device with a large, color, touch screen. It is NFC-enabled for contactless card and mobile device payments.
Ideal for merchants on the go and pay-at-the-table scenarios, enabling you to accept payment wherever your customers are. Ample memory supports applications that allow merchants to offer a customized payment experience, including coupons and loyalty programs
Does not Include the 'Dial Dongle'. The dial dongle enables you to program the machine with your merchant service information and allows for dial back up capabilities.
Purchase dial dongle here: http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00I2ZBI5Q
ProductInfo.Name: Verifone VX680 - Portable Credit card Processing Terminal - With WTS Software, GPRS
